oGDuYXIe1xi66b1FAHScnQ.text: Great coffee, great food, great service. If you're in Leith, you must visit this great little cafe.

qVukXFg3L7q0gg5CsBd5Gg.text: We came here half an hour before the kitchen opened. We were greeted and told that we could have beverages but not food until opening time. Ten minutes after our tea and coffee were served (best coffee in over two weeks), we were told the chef was in a good mood and would take our orders early. We ordered eggs and bacon as well as the lamb hash. Both were delicious. Our server came over twice to make sure we were satisfied during the meal. The decor and overall setting were comfortable.

photos.caption: Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

pa3pj-7YxEFCaGA57NEQbg.text: Amazing food, excellent service and extraordinary quality! Would love to come again! Thanks for a great breakfast!

MFe7TvJn4nQE0kCVgbDKHA.text: Delicious breakfast, coffee, and baked goods ! Highly recommended walking around Leith and dining here

MxUkboPswM3GU3MqMl-p5A.text: A great find thanks to Yelp!  We stopped in here a few months ago for a late breakfast and wow were we impressed with the food. The flavours were creative but most importantly I have never had better poached eggs ever. They were perfection.   Staff were nice if a little distant, and despite the odd time of day you could tell the atmosphere would be a good one. They even had a little box of toys in the corner! Win.

AGK3_gLJsKFb7g5Wu9A1eA.text: Wonderful service today. I'm really loving this place more and more. Can't get enough of the Avocado Mash. Also, had the scrambled eggs on toast with Chorizo and tomatoes. It was okay, but I think chorizo is maybe just not my thing. Plenty of other great items on the menu, so we'll continue to work our way through!   Also, second time in a row they provided water for my dog, Buddy, without having to ask! Lovely! Massive improvements in service!

photos.caption: Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Carrot cake!!!
Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Eggs Benedict special...one with smoked salmon the other with smoke bacon! In heaven!

AWVKGD_tAW7KrYva_qRISg.text: A great little hidden gem, just off the Water of Leith. The coffee is great, and they have a small selection of really good cakes made in house. The menu is expanding, totally worth checking out.

photos.caption: Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

kVRmLgpmf_fWWqL7v4_aoQ.text: Tobermory Omelette. A nice alternative to a full on fry up.  Informal, not too busy when we were in as a bit off the beaten track which suited us, serves nice coffee and works with locals suppliers so many boxes ticked.  Nice alternative brunch options. Be back to try their cake selection next time though.

photos.caption: Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

4qSxM0PPZVFNnMaH50l8LQ.text: This is a cozy place with great food and service. They have all types of dishes whether you want something on the healthier side or to indulge. Definitely stop in for breakfast if you are in the area!

PTwokRMnXnxvBjMRUkpfYQ.text: We love doing brunch and Ostara really did not disappoint. Ostara is a new edition to Leith and if they keep up the quality of food and innovative menu they are on course to be one of the best brunch spots in Edinburgh. The menu is healthy, creative and reminds me of brunch menus that you only see in the USA and Australia. I had mixed chilli bean on toast with poached eggs (cooked to perfection) and a side of puddledub sausages. The other half had Avocado smash on homemade bread with feta, chilli and tomatoes. Finally, Ostara benefits from space and you can actually get a private seat without someone ear-wigging into your conversation which is a rarity in Edinburgh. Also next to the Water of Leith its the perfect pitstop for a day out.  We will definitely be back!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Chilli bean on toast with perfect poached eggs
Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Avocado smash - just delish!!

YIijbXL_FT0rKFpWXeCncA.text: We enjoy eating where local people eat so after asking our waitress last night at the Wedgwood(AMAZING) she told us her favorite was Ostara...we just left and it was the best breakfast we've ever had! It is a charming little place with wonderful coffee and teas. You can not go wrong in whatever you order. I can only speak for their breakfast; however, from the homemade desserts they showed us I'm wishing we weren't leaving the city just so we could eat there again. Definitely worth the trip!

z_fyJrcI8IUz8QzIsP4xqw.text: Had the pleasure to taste the good wine selection (thanks to whoever takes care of that) and the good, local ingredients. The place deserves the good reputation and can only grow further.

photos.caption: Photo of Ostara - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Local, organic and tasteful elements, and a great wine selection. A good one.
